add_subdirectory(curl)
add_subdirectory(zstd)
add_subdirectory(json)
add_subdirectory(glog)

macro(include_third_party name)
    include_curl(${name})
    include_zstd(${name})
    include_json(${name})
    include_glog(${name})
endmacro()

macro(link_third_party name)
    link_curl(${name})
    link_zstd(${name})
    link_glog(${name})
endmacro()
